section1.title: THE LAGREE METHOD
section1.line3: THIS REVOLUTIONARY METHOD REINVENTS THE WAY WE TRAIN. A HIGHLY EFFECTIVE PRACTICE DESIGNED TO INTENSIFY EVERY EFFORT - WITH ELEGANCE, STRENGTH, AND CONTROL.

line4.bold1: MUSCLE STRENGTHENING, CARDIO, BALANCE, MOBILITY, DEEP CORE WORK, AND STRETCHING:

section2.title: THE MICRO DELUXE
section2.line2: AT STARLETTE, LAGREE IS PRACTICED ON THE METHOD'S SIGNATURE MACHINE: THE MICRO DELUXE.
section2.line3: COMPACT AND BRILLIANTLY ENGINEERED, IT FEATURES ADJUSTABLE RESISTANCE AND MOVING PLATFORM - ALLOWING FOR FULL-BODY ENGAGEMENT WHILE PROTECTING YOUR JOINTS.
section2.line4: POSTURE, ALIGNMENT, PRECISION: EACH MOVEMENT IS SLOW, TARGETED, AND FULLY CONTROLLED.
section2.line5: IN 50 MINUTES ONLY: YOUR BODY TONES UP, YOUR SILHOUETTE LENGTHENS, YOUR POSTURE IS ELEVATED.
